description:
Manami dresses herself up and goes out to find a boyfriend, but after a run-in with the Red Scorpions, she loses her contacts and is saved by a boy she falls in love with... her brother.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Don`t Cry Jingoro! The Heat of Young Love
Nakuna Jingoro! Ai to Seishun no Hatsujouki
泣くなジンゴロ!愛と青春の発情期
